## Checklist

- [ ] Docs parity maintained (update relevant files in `docs/` and `docs/agents/`)
- [ ] Security: No secrets committed; follows `docs/policies/guardrails.md`
- [ ] Reproducibility: Versions pinned; deterministic steps
- [ ] Observability: Health checks/logs/alerts updated if needed
- [ ] Rollback plan described in the PR or release notes
- [ ] Tests updated or added (unit/integration) and passing
